name: Knockout Roll
description:
You are master sumo wrestler and a rival school has hired ninjas to attack your dojo.

Send 'em rolling back up the mountains!

Controls:

M1(Press/hold): Dash in direction of mouse

M2: Launch Rocket

Space: Build a wall to reflect enemies and their rockets

Left-Shift(Press/hold): Jump into the sky to evade damage and land down to deal damage
